children.name: Ammon
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: believest
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: believing
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: boasting
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: bow
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: brethren
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: call
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: called
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: carry
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: created
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth. Believest thou this?

children.name: delivered
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: desirest
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: doth
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: earth
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth. Believest thou this?

children.name: faith
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: fear
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: God
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: gone
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: has
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: hast
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: heaven
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth. Believest thou this?

children.name: hope
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: is
children.sourceText: Believest thou that there is a God?

children.name: Ishmael
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: joy
children.sourceText: Ammon, I fear that thy joy doth carry thee away unto boasting.

children.name: king
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: Lamoni
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: land
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: lives
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: livest
children.sourceText: Behold, assuredly as thou livest, O king, there is a God.

children.name: Lord
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: mankind
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: name
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: people
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: prison
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: receive
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: redeem
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: repent
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: servants
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: shalt
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: sins
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: son
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?

children.name: spare
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: spirit
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: stand
children.sourceText: Therefore he put forth his hand and raised the king from the earth, and said unto him: Stand. And he stood upon his feet, receiving his strength.

children.name: teach
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: thing
children.sourceText: If thou desirest this thing, if thou wilt bow down before God, yea, if thou wilt repent of all thy sins, and will bow down before God, and call on his name in faith, believing that ye shall receive, then shalt thou receive the hope which thou desirest.

children.name: things
children.sourceText: Yea, he is that Great Spirit, and he created all things both in heaven and in earth. Believest thou this?

children.name: way
children.sourceText: Behold, the Spirit of the Lord has called him another way; he has gone to the land of Ishmael, to teach the people of Lamoni.

children.name: wilt
children.sourceText: And now, O king, if thou wilt spare our lives, we will be thy servants.

children.name: behold
children.sourceText: Behold, O king, we are the brethren of Ammon, whom thou hast delivered out of prison.

children.name: come
children.sourceText: Believest thou that the Son of God shall come to redeem mankind from their sins?
